display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 298px; height: 1px; padding-top: 112px; margin-left: 878px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #333333;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#333333, #c1c1c1); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
1. Alert on symptoms, not causes
Users care about impact, not internals
2. Every alert should be actionable
If no action needed, don't alert
3. User impact > Internal metrics
'Checkout failing' not 'DB slow'
4. Include runbook links
How to diagnose and resolve
5. Avoid alert fatigue
Too many alerts = ignored alerts
6. Test alerts regularly
Fire drills and chaos engineering

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 375px; margin-left: 551px;

div.div:
Prometheus
collects metrics
from targets
error_rate: 0.08
latency_p99: 2.5s

div.div:
PromQL evaluation
alert: HighErrorRate
expr: error_rate > 0.05
for: 5m
FIRING!

div.div:
‚Ä¢ Deduplicate alerts
‚Ä¢ Group by service/team
‚Ä¢ Apply silences
‚Ä¢ Inhibit related alerts
‚Ä¢ Route to receivers

severity: critical
‚Üí PagerDuty
severity: warning
‚Üí Slack
team: payments

üìü PagerDuty
üí¨ Slack
üìß Email
üì± SMS
üîó Webhook
üìù JIRA ticket

div.div:
On-call engineer:
1. Acknowledge alert
2. Follow runbook
3. Mitigate issue
4. Resolve alert
5. Post-mortem if needed

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 635px; margin-left: 126px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #333333;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #333333;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #333333;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#333333, #c1c1c1); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
‚Ä¢ HighErrorRate: error_rate > 5% for 5m
‚Ä¢ HighLatency: p99 > 1s for 10m
‚Ä¢ ServiceDown: up == 0 for 1m
‚Ä¢ LowThroughput: req/s < baseline
‚Ä¢ QueueBacklog: queue_size > 1000

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(213, 232, 212), rgb(31, 47, 30)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(130, 179, 102), rgb(68, 110, 44));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 695px; margin-left: 446px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #333333;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#333333, #c1c1c1); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: nowrap;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 717px; margin-left: 323px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #333333;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#333333, #c1c1c1); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
‚Ä¢ HighCPU: cpu_usage > 85% for 15m
‚Ä¢ LowMemory: mem_available < 10%
‚Ä¢ LowDiskSpace: disk_free < 10%
‚Ä¢ HighNetworkErrors: errors > 100/s
‚Ä¢ NodeNotReady: k8s node unhealthy

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 242, 204), rgb(40, 29, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(214, 182, 86), rgb(109, 81, 0));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 815px; margin-left: 156px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #333333;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#333333, #c1c1c1); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: nowrap;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 837px; margin-left: 33px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #333333;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#333333, #c1c1c1); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
‚Ä¢ OrderDropoff: orders/hr < 80% baseline
‚Ä¢ PaymentFailures: failed_payments > 10/m
‚Ä¢ SignupDropoff: signups down 50%
‚Ä¢ RevenueAnomaly: hourly revenue drop

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 815px; margin-left: 446px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #333333;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#333333, #c1c1c1); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: nowrap;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #333333;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#333333, #c1c1c1); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
‚Ä¢ ErrorBudgetLow: budget < 20% remaining
‚Ä¢ BurnRateCritical: 14.4x normal burn rate
‚Ä¢ AvailabilitySLO: < 99.9% over 1h
‚Ä¢ LatencySLO: p99 > target for 30m

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 635px; margin-left: 776px;

div.div:
Every alert should link to a runbook:
‚Ä¢ What does this alert mean?
‚Ä¢ How to diagnose the issue?
‚Ä¢ How to mitigate/resolve?
‚Ä¢ Who to escalate to?

switch.text: Every alert should link to a runbook:...

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 230, 204), rgb(54, 33, 10)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(215, 155, 0), rgb(153, 101, 0));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 695px; margin-left: 1041px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #333333;

display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#333333, #c1c1c1); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
0-5min: Primary on-call
5-15min: Secondary on-call
15-30min: Team lead
30min+: Engineering manager
1hr+: VP Engineering (P1 only)

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(213, 232, 212), rgb(31, 47, 30)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(130, 179, 102), rgb(68, 110, 44));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 805px; margin-left: 771px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #333333;

display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 827px; margin-left: 653px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #333333;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#333333, #c1c1c1); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
After every significant incident:
‚Ä¢ What happened? (timeline)
‚Ä¢ Why did it happen? (root cause)
‚Ä¢ How did we respond?
‚Ä¢ What will we do to prevent it?
‚Ä¢ Action items with owners

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(248, 206, 204), rgb(81, 45, 43)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(184, 84, 80), rgb(215, 129, 126));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 805px; margin-left: 1041px;

div.div:
‚Ä¢ Review alerts monthly: delete unused
‚Ä¢ Track alert-to-action ratio
‚Ä¢ Tune thresholds based on data
‚Ä¢ Group related alerts
‚Ä¢ Use proper inhibition rules
‚Ä¢ Target: < 2 pages/week/person
